post:
Hey there,

We've got some great sales going on - LET Exclusive! 

Info
- OpenVZ Virtual Private Servers are hosted on Quad Core Intel i7 servers in Chicago, IL.
- We utilize SolusVM and all clients are covered under our 99.9% uptime and 10 day money back guarantee. 
- Orders are automatically setup, so just a few minutes after ordering you'll be emailed all information required to login and begin.
-Many OS templates are available

All prices listed below are lifetime discounts - the price will never change. 

☆**VPS 256MB**☆
256MB dedicated RAM
15GB RAID-1 storage
400GB/month bandwidth - 1Gbps!
Linux - OpenVZ/SolusVM
Semi-Managed
99.9% Uptime Guarantee and SLA credit program
1 IPv4 (extra for $1.25/m)
Only $4.99/month - recurring SALE price! 
[Use coupon code let256](http://clients.cubixcloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=78&promocode=let256)

☆**VPS 512MB**☆
512MB dedicated RAM
30GB RAID-1 storage
500GB/month bandwidth - 1Gbps!
Linux - OpenVZ/SolusVM
Semi-Managed
99.9% Uptime Guarantee and SLA credit program
1 IPv4 (extra for $1.25/m)
Only $6.49/month - recurring SALE price! 
[Use coupon code let512](http://clients.cubixcloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=80&promocode=let512)

These prices are exclusive and only available for a limited time. Payment is accepted via PayPal.

Average setup time: Servers are provisioned instantly until space is filled, at which point we will contact you and have your billing date adjusted. (Should be less than 48 hours to deploy a new node) 

Need additional RAM, Bandwidth, Disk Space, IPs, etc? Contact us! We can upgrade your plan at any time! 

Speed Tests
108.174.54.177
100mb Test File - [100mb.test](http://test.cubixcloud.com/100mb.test)

As always, please let us know if you have any questions or concerns. Looking forward to working with you all. :)
